bibl.title: Origins of the Book. Egypt's Contribution to the Development of the Book from Papyrus to Codex.
bibl.seg: Hussein Mohamed A., Origins of the Book. Egypt's Contribution to the Development of the Book from Papyrus to Codex.
Leipzig, Edition Leipzig, 1970, 4°, 135 pp., nombr. figg. et 72 pll., dont 32 coul.
C.R. par Jean-Claude Goyon, BibO 29 (1972) pp. 15-16. - Hans Lülfing, DLZ 92 (1972) coll. 999-1001. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 49 (1974) No. 98, pp. 405-407.
